name: Necromancy (bunnyUFO)
description:
Instructions and Tutorial Video Below

Give life to the elements and defend your home from nosey knights.
You must draw shapes representing the elements to summon creatures

The summonable ceratures are:
Zombie (flesh spiral symbol)
Flame Wisp (triangle fire symbol)
Eletric Wisp (zigzag luighting symbol)
Stone Golem (Start + Square + loop symbols power, rock, soul)
